bike.description: Full high modulus carbon Tri/TT frame, Dyad Supreme M40/M30 lay-up, NACA compliant profiles, chainstay-mounted rear brake, internal cable routing, integrated seat post clamp design, seat tube with full rear wheel recess, flat-oval top tube, aerofoil seatstays, PressFit 30 BB shell, rear-entry horizontal dropouts with axle-position adjustment bolts

components.description: Windshield aero carbon with rear-facing/enclosed front brake for reduced aerodynamic drag, with brake pad adjustment ports

American Classic Carbon 58mm series 3 11-Speed clincher, 18/24, 58mm aero carbon rim, AC high-low flange Micro 58 hubs with ceramic bearings including titanium QR and AC stainless steel bladed spokes.
Vittoria Open Corsa EVO Slick, 700 x 23c, folding
Shimano Ultegra Di2 RD-6870 rear and Ultegra FD-6870 braze-on front with 5 port SM-EW90-F stem junction box and internal battery
Shimano Ultegra Di2 ST-6871 Base Bar and SW-R671 2 button Bar End Shifters, 22-Speed
FSA PressFit 30 with Ceramic bearings and Wheels MFG adaptors
Tektro R725 forged alloy hidden U-type TT calipers with SwissStop cartridge pads and Shimano Ultegra Di2 shifter/brake lever
Profile Design T3+ Drop-bend carbon fiber extensions with SVET ZERO carbon base bar, 31.8 x 400mm (S/M), 420mm (L/XL)
Profile Design Aris, 3D forged 6061 alloy, 7JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (S/M), 100mm (L/XL)
Jamis gel suede tape with Jamis logo
Jamis Aero carbon post with integrated Di2 battery mount
Cobb Cycling V-Flow Plus with hollow chromoly-moly rails
